sentences.english: In which, it's not as easy as the so called "popularity of Sinology" can explain it.

sentences.english: But it was such a master that didn't know where he himself lived.

definition: to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
academy of classical learning (Tang Dynasty - Qing Dynasty)
the Absolute or Supreme Ultimate, the source of all things according to some interpretations of Chinese mythology

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
sinology/Chinese studies (in foreign schools)/Han Learning, a Qing dynasty movement aiming at a philological appraisal of the Classics
